review:
"The Best heart doctor with Golden Heart".
I am Dr.Tammineni Rajya Lakshmi, a homeopathic physician,  In 2021, my mother got hit by COVID, her lungs got damaged almost 65-70% and suffered a lot with postural hypotension. It was almost minimal chance to survive. Everybody around me adviced to pray God for her recovery. My prayers got answered and divine came in the form of Dr Karthik Tummala( "Daivam manushya roopena"). He took care of my mom, given excellent treatment and has been giving follow up care till date.Today I have my mom alive only because of him and his family members.
He has been giving his selfless service and treatment to all our family members. We get his appointments at his hospital ( ABC Heart Care, Suryarao Peta, Vijayawada. 
Dr Karthik is one of the famous cardiologists in Vijayawada and Hyderabad. He is extremely talented, ******** ************* and highly experienced and thoughtful cardiologist.  He is kind & humane to patients. He is a polite, calm, honest & caring cardio vascular physician. He gives individual care for every patient in his unique ways of handling. Above all, he is the best human being.  His staff are supportive and caring. Thank you sir.
I strongly recommend Dr Karthik Tummala's consultation for people who required expert opinion and skilled treatment for their cardio-vascular problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I personally not much into reviewing but thought it’s worth giving one for Dr. Karthik.

Dr. Karthik has been the togo doctor for three generations in my family. He was very instrumental in diagnosis and treatment of not only heart related issues but also very critical in understanding the issues subjective to patient. His timely intervention and support had helped us in saving our dear’ed ones for more than one occasion. His diagnosis is spot on and always ensure to follow up. I highly recommend him.

Dr. Karthik is an excellent cardiologist with tremendous knowledge about other medical conditions as well. He was quick to diagnose why I felt dizziness recently with pulse rate over 100. Caused by low BP, he immediately advised me to get off BP medications and control the BPM. Checked ECG, 2D Cardiograph and Lipid profiles and advised to reduce other medications as well. 

More importantly he was truly a professional and absolute pleasure to communicate with.  Thank you, Dr. Karthik. RatnaKumar

Karthik is humble, **********, empathetic Doctor.

I have known him from his childhood and he is like my elder son.

He has suggested my son to undergo Bariatric surgery in 2014 and he is healthy and energetic now without health complications

During covid pandemic, he has treated my husband.

He prefers to stay in touch with his patients on their physical and mental health and suggests them his insights

He takes care of my health and enquire about my wellbeing whenever and wherever we interact.

Dr.Karthik is friendly and experienced doctor.He patiently listened to the problem  and has given the treatment. He makes us feel free  and explains very well about the problem.It is very difficult now a days to find a doctor like him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** ** ********* ****** *** **** ** *** **** **********The first year after operation faced some difficulties,but later on it showed the result.He was very friendly during check up's.He is very kind and humble towrads patients.Especially the moral support he gave me during the operation was speech less.I was very grateful to have a such a doctor.I owe to him forever.

Dr.Karthik is very experienced and well understandable doctor. He listens to the issues carefully and made us always feel comfortable to explain our issues. He don't offer any medicines unnecessary.

Have been visiting him for many years now and would highly recommend him

Dr Karthik is very cordial with patients and very cool even though patients are asking several questions.  He diagnosis the problem within no time. Such a capable and brilliant doctor. I am proud to say that Vijayawada people are very lucky to have such a doctor in our town. He is doing angioplasty very easily and cleanly with 100% success rate.

Good hospitality 
Receptionist responded up-to-date and 
cardiologist  Doctor Karthik gaaru . everyone treated me good.

But total medicines not available
**** **** ********** *** ** *** **** ****** *** *********** Doctor told me how  to control BP And heart rate. Good experience
